name: Old Friends (Matt Beckett)
description:
Here's a shortie created for TOJam 2021: Feels like a Re-run.

I copped the idea from Marina Abramović and Ulay's The Lovers: The Great Wall Walk.  The title (and maybe more) is from a song by Roger Miller.

Featuring:

  • 1-2 Minutes of Gameplay
  • Fullscreen or 640x640 (workplace mode)
  • Willie Nelson playing guitar

If you enjoyed this game and would like more people to know about it, please rate it 5 stars!

Made using Unity and FMOD.

Mac users - right click and open

Windows build courtesy of Ethan Schubert - TY!!
